ThingDef.label: oil
ThingDef.description:
A versatile, high-quality liquid used for cooking, crafting, and various artisan processes. Extracted from natural sources, it plays a crucial role in both culinary and industrial applications.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations</color> (assuming oil press is used):

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 oil requires 50 ingredients at an average of 1.1 value (55), and sells for 10, giving a <color=#33CC33>45%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 1000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.1</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.3 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>33.33</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.33</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
